Description: Combine wind and earth to create a blinding sandstorm.
Summon a small whirlwind filled with dirt and debris.
Create a cyclone filled with rocks and debris to batter enemies.
Create a vortex that turns the ground into quicksand.
Create a protective shield of swirling wind and stone.
Summon a twister that carries rocks and stones to strike enemies.
Launch shards of stone carried by the wind at high speed.
Release a surge of wind and dust to blind and choke enemies.
Create a whirlwind filled with large stones to crush enemies.
Summon a wind carrying sharp rocks to cut and bruise enemies.
Create a storm of wind and earth that tears up the battlefield.
Summon spires of sand and stone carried by the wind to impale foes.
Summon a craggy terrain with gale-force winds to deter enemies.
Create a tornado that carries large boulders, causing massive damage.
Summon a tempest filled with rocks and stones that ravages the battlefield.
Call upon the winds of the mountains to strike with stone-laden gales.
Summon a dragon made of wind and sand to attack enemies.
Cause a quake carried by the wind, disrupting all terrain in the area.
Summon the wrath of the earth and wind, causing widespread devastation.
Unleash the ultimate storm of wind and stone, reshaping the battlefield.
